name: Continuous Wave Accelerometer Data File
summary: A CWA file contains raw actigraphy data captured by an Axivity device, which is used to record physical activity for medical cohort studies of various sizes. It stores rest and activity data collected from a human in the Continuous Wave Accelerometer (CWA) binary format. CWA files may also contain metadata and device configurations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
